definition: sorrow/grief/pity/to grieve for/to pity/to lament/to condole
Ai (c. 2000 BC), sixth of legendary Flame Emperors 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God, also known as Li 釐|厘[Li2]
four types of human emotions, namely: happiness 歡喜|欢喜[huan1 xi3], anger 憤怒|愤怒[fen4 nu4], sorrow 悲哀[bei1 ai1] and joy 快樂|快乐[kuai4 le4]

sentences.english: Let your baby know that you hear his babbles, coos, and gurgles .
sentences.chinese: 让孩子知道你在听他咿咿呀呀，关心他的喜怒哀乐。

sentences.english: Why is there also feeling in game?
sentences.chinese: 为什么在游戏里也有喜怒哀乐？

sentences.english: Another guard walks behind them, carrying a small stereo playing funeral music.
sentences.chinese: 走在后面的护卫提着一个小立体声，播放着哀乐。

sentences.english: Ji Kangs work " Tone has no sadness or happiness "embodies his unique music appreciation theory.
sentences.chinese: 《声无哀乐论》体现了嵇康独特的音乐欣赏思想。

sentences.english: The radio played dirges all day long.
sentences.chinese: 广播电台整天都在播放哀乐。

sentences.english: We would like to tell her everything about us---happiness and sadness.
sentences.chinese: 我们愿意把自己的喜怒哀乐告诉她。

sentences.english: So people will be more spiritual, feeling the pains and joys of others.
sentences.chinese: 因此，人们更加高尚地去体会别人的喜怒哀乐。

sentences.english: We get together and catch up and share our joys and sorrows.
sentences.chinese: 我们相聚在一起分享喜怒哀乐。

sentences.english: Finally in the family of the passions. " A variety of flavor and taste."
sentences.chinese: 也终于在家庭的喜怒哀乐里细品了各种滋味和情趣。

sentences.english: Dream and reality gap, joys and sorrows, and might be sensitized mixed feelings.
sentences.chinese: 梦想与现实的差距，喜怒哀乐，悲欢离合，百感交集。

definition: lit. as if weeping and complaining (idiom)/fig. mournful (music or singing)
to participate in funeral procession/to attend a burial
modulation (rising and falling pitch)/intonation/a cadence/to rise and fall (of a body floating in water)
to perform music/to play a tune
to pay respects to the dead/to mark sb's passing
